passages.text:
Characters:
------------
*Key Characters*
[[Self-Checkout]]
[[Cashier]] (required)
[[Free Samples Guy]] (required)
[[Grocery Store workers]] (helpful)
[[Police Officer]]

*Side Characters*
[[Deli Worker]]
[[Single Mom + Nosy Kid]]
[[Awkward College Kid]]
[[Lost Elderly Foreigner]]
[[Religious Fanatic]]
passages.name: Start

passages.text:
(The cashier scans your items)

Did you find everything okay?

[[I found you okay]]
[[No->did_not_find]]
[[Yes->found]]
[[I didn't steal anything!]]

// note: add unidentified price to the dialogue
passages.name: Cashier

passages.text:
Would you like to try a free sample?

[[I w-w-w-would love to! What?->Yes]]
[[I am very busy, no time for samples.->No]]
[[Yes]]
[[No]]

links.name: I am very busy, no time for samples.

passages.name: Free Samples Guy

passages.text:
Can I help you find anything?

[[Bread]]
[[Milk]]
[[Eggs]]
[[Agh!]]
passages.name: Grocery Store workers

passages.text:
Is everything alright?

[[Everything is under control!]]
[[Sir yes sir ma'am]]
[[I'm sorry I'm sorry I was just nervous->pol_awk]]
[[Uh, no, wait yes, wait...->pol_awk]]

links.name: I'm sorry I'm sorry I was just nervous

passages.name: Police Officer

passages.text:
Hi what can I get for you?

[[milk->not deli]]
[[eggs->not deli]]
[[bread->not deli]]
[[sliced turkey]]
passages.name: Deli Worker

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: Single Mom + Nosy Kid

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: Awkward College Kid

passages.text:
Bu hao yi si, ni zhi bu zhi dao xue xiao zai nar?

[[I'm sorry, I don't understand->understand]]
[[Um...->understand]]
[[Could you repeat that?->understand]]
[[Do you speak english?->understand]]
passages.name: Lost Elderly Foreigner

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: Religious Fanatic

passages.text:
So, how do you like it?

[[Yum. Good. Yes.->Good]]
[[It's delicious.->Good]]
[[Thanks. Bye.->end]]
[[Not much...]]
passages.name: Yes

passages.text:
END
He looks sad
What if he's depressed?
What if I made him suicidal?
He must think I'm a snob
passages.name: No

passages.text:
Well, you can buy it, from this shelf!

[[I'll take one->end]]
[[Uhhhhh... bye->leave without]]
[[I will come back later]]
[[No thank you->leave without]]
passages.name: Good

passages.text:
END
Misunderstanding!
She thinks I'm flirting!
Sexual harassment?
I'm turning red!
She'll think that's a sign
This is really bad!
My life is over!
passages.name: I found you okay

passages.text:
What are you looking for? :(

[[Nothing!->found]]
[[Actually, I misspoke. I found everything]]
[[Potatoes]]

links.name: Actually, I misspoke. I found everything
links.link: Actually, I misspoke. I found everything

passages.name: did_not_find

passages.text:
Ugh. This bread isn't scanning. How much was it?

[[Lie]]
[[I don't know]]
[[About three dollars]]
[[I can go check]]
passages.name: found

passages.text:
END
They didn't ask!
I was too nervous
They'll think I did
I'll go to jail
My life is over
passages.name: I didn't steal anything!

passages.text:
(You dig through your wallet, but you only have a hundred dollar bill and a couple of pennies)

[[Pay with the hundred]]
[[On second thought, I will use my card->Credit2]]
[[Uh I uh only have a hundred...->Pay with the hundred]]
[[PANIC!]]

links.name: On second thought, I will use my card
Uh I uh only have a hundred...

passages.name: Cash

passages.text:
(You swipe your card through the card-reader. The interface reads "error".) 

[[What happened?]]
[[On second thought, I'll pay with cash->Cash2]]
[[PANIC!]]

links.name: On second thought, I'll pay with cash

passages.name: Credit

passages.text:
Potatoes are in the vegatable isle.

[[*Leave to go get a potato*->end]]
[[I changed my mind, I am ready to check out->found]]

links.name: I changed my mind, I am ready to check out

passages.name: Potatoes

passages.text:
END
She didn't laugh
It's not funny
Oh no
She looks angry
A mistake
How can I pay now?
This is bad
passages.name: I'm broke

passages.text:
You win! In the actual game you would be taken back to walking around and you will never see this text.

[[Start]]
passages.name: end

passages.text:
(She takes the bill from you and looks at you strangely)

[[Sorry! It is all I have->sorry]]
[[*Wait for her to make change*]]
[[Oh god you hate me now, I'm so sorry->sorry]]
[[Wait! I want to pay with credit->Credit2]]

links.name: Sorry! It is all I have
Oh god you hate me now, I'm so sorry
Wait! I want to pay with credit

passages.name: Pay with the hundred

passages.text:
It is alright. Let me see that. :(

[[*wait*->*Wait for her to make change*]]
[[*wait*->*Wait for her to make change*]]
[[*wait*->*Wait for her to make change*]]
[[*wait*->*Wait for her to make change*]]
passages.name: sorry

passages.text:
(She rubs a conterfeit marker over the bill and then places it in the register. She hands you back four twenties, a ten, and a nickel. She also hands you your reciept, and a single bag with your three items.)

[[Thank you!->end]]
[[Excuse me, you shortchanged me.->change]]
[[That is not enough->change]]
[[Keep the change!]]
passages.name: *Wait for her to make change*

passages.text:
No I didn't. I gave you back ninety-one-oh-five.

[[*Look through the bills again*]]
[[No, you gave me back ninety and a nickel. I still need a dollar->insist]]
[[But... I am the customer... you have no right...->insist]]
[[Count them again->insist]]

links.name: No, you gave me back ninety and a nickel. I still need a dollar
But... I am the customer... you have no right...

passages.name: change

passages.text:
I'm not allowed to take tips. 

[[Oh, right, sorry, um, I'll go now->ignored]]
[[But you shortchanged me...->change]]

links.name: Oh, right, sorry, um, I'll go now

passages.name: Keep the change!

passages.text:
(You find the one stuck to the back of the ten that she gave you)

[[Ah, it is here. My mistake. Have a good day.->end]]
[[*pretend* You should count them again->insist]]
[[Oh no I'm so sorry I'm sorry I'm so sorry->ignored]]
[[*run away*->end]]

links.name: Ah, it is here. My mistake. Have a good day.
Oh no I'm so sorry I'm sorry I'm so sorry

passages.name: *Look through the bills again*

passages.text:
(She looks through the stack of bills that you hand back to her) Sorry about that, I was sure I gave it to you. Here. (She opens the register again and takes out a one dollar bill)

[[Thank you.->end]]
[[Ugh, finally!->ignored]]
[[I always get my way in the end!->ignored]]
[[*walk away*->end]]

links.name: I always get my way in the end!

passages.name: insist

passages.text:
Have a nice day. (She turns to the next customer and begins bagging his groceries)

[[*walk away*->end]]
[[*slink away*->end]]
passages.name: ignored

passages.text:
(She waits impatiently while you fumble with the pin code)

[[I uh... forgot my pin number->pin]]
[[Four... six... three... eight... who do we appreciate?->pin]]
[[What is it again?->pin]]

links.name: I uh... forgot my pin number
Four... six... three... eight... who do we appreciate?

passages.name: Debit

passages.text:
You're holding up the line. Please pay.

[[Almost got it...->forgot]]
[[I'll just use cash->Cash2]]
[[Ah, sorry...->forgot]]
[[I'm just nervous->forgot]]
passages.name: pin

passages.text:
You... look... school?

[[I'm still not getting it.->understand2]]
[[Are you lost?]]
[[I'm sorry, I cannot help you.->end]]
[[Um... I, er...->understand2]]

links.name: I'm sorry, I cannot help you.

passages.name: understand

passages.text:
School... you know... where?

[[Are you looking for the school?]]
[[I'm still not getting it->understand3]]
[[Ehh?->understand3]]
[[I'm going to walk away now->end]]

links.name: Are you looking for the school?
links.link: Are you looking for the school?

links.name: I'm going to walk away now

passages.name: understand2

passages.text:
Yes! Yes! You know school?

[[Are you looking for the school?]]
[[There's a school nearby->Are you looking for the school?]]
[[I'm sorry, I can't help you->end]]
[[Um... I...->understand3]]

links.name: Are you looking for the school?
links.link: Are you looking for the school?

links.name: There's a school nearby
links.link: Are you looking for the school?

links.name: I'm sorry, I can't help you

passages.name: Are you lost?

passages.text:
Yes! yes. Where?

[[A couple of blocks from here.->confuse]]
[[I'm sorry, I do not know.->understand3]]

links.name: A couple of blocks from here.
I'm sorry, I do not know.

passages.name: Are you looking for the school?

passages.text:
Unh! No no no. Sank. (The man turns and walks away)

[[Uh... goodbye?->end]]
[[*Say nothing*->end]]
passages.name: understand3

passages.text:
? :(

[[Um...->confuse]]
[[I don't think I can explain it->bad]]
[[Excuse me->end]]

links.name: I don't think I can explain it

passages.name: confuse

passages.text:
(You swipe your card through the card-reader. The interface reads "error".) 

[[What happened?]]
[[PANIC!]]
passages.name: Credit2

passages.text:
(You dig through your wallet, but you only have a hundred dollar bill and a couple of pennies)

[[Pay with the hundred->Pay with the hundred2]]
[[Uh I uh only have a hundred...->Pay with the hundred2]]
[[PANIC!]]

links.name: Uh I uh only have a hundred...

passages.name: Cash2

passages.text:
The bread is in aisle 14.

[[Thanks!->end]]
[[Thank you->end]]
[[Bye->end]]
[[Kay->nonchalant]]
passages.name: Bread

passages.text:
The milk is in the dairy section at the back of the store.

[[Thanks!->end]]
[[Thank you->end]]
[[Bye->end]]
[[Kay->nonchalant]]
passages.name: Milk

passages.text:
The eggs are in the back of the store.

[[Thanks!->end]]
[[Thank you->end]]
[[Bye->end]]
[[Kay->nonchalant]]
passages.name: Eggs

passages.text:
END
Why did I scream?
They're staring
Oh no...
This is a nightmare
They're scared of me
They think I'm weird
passages.name: Agh!

passages.text:
GAME OVER, you lose, restart. You'll never see this text in the actual game.
[[Start]]
passages.name: bad

passages.text:
Then what's got you running through the aisles?

[[I was just in a hurry->pol_kids]]
[[Nothing->pol_kids]]
[[Sorry->pol_kids]]
[[I'm running from someone]]

links.name: I was just in a hurry

passages.name: Everything is under control!

passages.text:
Kids these days, always in a hurry. Don't run anymore, you'll hurt someone.

[[Thank you Officer!->end]]
[[Bye!->end]]
[[I will never run again!->bad]]
passages.name: pol_kids

passages.text:
What? Who?

[[That was just a joke! hahaha...->pol_awk]]
[[Eep!->pol_awk]]
[[I'm running from you!->bad]]

links.name: That was just a joke! hahaha...

passages.name: I'm running from someone

passages.text:
... do you need to come with me back to the station?
[[No officer!->pol_no]]
[[yes->bad]]
passages.name: pol_awk

passages.text:
...sigh. Just don't run around in the grocery store ok?

[[Thank you officer!->end]]
[[Bye!->end]]
[[I will never run again!->bad]]
passages.name: pol_no

passages.text:
You can address me as "officer". That is what I think you are trying to say.

[[Yeah...->polite]]
[[Sorry->polite]]
[[Yes officer->polite]]
passages.name: pol_double

passages.text:
You seem alright. Just don't go running around ok?

[[Thank you Sir!->end]]
[[Bye!->end]]
[[I will never run again!->bad]]
passages.name: I was trying to be polite

passages.text:
You're not mocking me, are you?

[[No sir, I mean, ma'am!->pol_double]]
[[I was trying to be polite]]
[[Eep!->pol_awk]]

links.name: I was trying to be polite
links.link: I was trying to be polite

passages.name: Sir yes sir ma'am

passages.text:
You seem alright. Just don't go running around ok?

[[Thank you Sir!->bad]]
[[Bye Ma'am!->bad]]
[[I won't run officer!->end]]
[[Okay, thank you officer->end]]
passages.name: polite

passages.text:
Ah, I'm afraid this is the deli.

[[Sorry!->bad_deli]]
[[My bad->bad_deli]]
[[Oh...->bad_deli]]
[[I knew that->bad_deli]]
passages.name: not deli

passages.text:
Would you like thin or tick sliced? Honey roasted or spiced? Light or dark? How much?

[[Uh... four darks, thin pounds, honey sliced?->nonsense]]
[[Um... a pound of the store brand.->turkey]]
[[Er... Honey spiced with thick please...->nonsense]]
[[Agh, light sliced with honey?->nonsense]]

links.name: Uh... four darks, thin pounds, honey sliced?
Um... a pound of the store brand.
Er... Honey spiced with thick please...

passages.name: sliced turkey

passages.text:
END
What did I just say?
That was jibberish
It's not my fault
It's too confusing
He's looking at me
He thinks I'm an idiot
passages.name: nonsense

passages.text:
Here you go!

[[Thanks->end]]
[[Bye->end]]
[[Actually... I don't want turkey... sorry->bad_deli]]
[[I changed my mind.->bad_deli]]

links.name: Actually... I don't want turkey... sorry

passages.name: turkey

passages.text:
END
He looks upset
Did he make it himself?
I insulted him
What if he hates me?
What it he's depressed?
passages.name: Not much...

passages.text:
END
He thinks I didn't like it
What if he blames himself?
What if he made it?
This is so awkward
I can feel him watching
passages.name: leave without

passages.text:
END
He knows I won't
Why did this happen?
He trapped me
I have to go back
I have to leave
He sees through me
What if he blames himself?
passages.name: I will come back later

passages.text:
END
Is "Kay" passive aggressive?
Was I bratty?
Does he hate me now?
He'll compain about me
I ruined his night.
passages.name: nonchalant

passages.text:
END
What?
She's so annoyed
Why am I so nervous?
I screwed it all up
This is bad
passages.name: Actually, I misspoke. I found everything

passages.text:
Thank you for shopping at PriceMart!
Please scan your first item
[[scan milk->error]]
[[scan bread->error]]
[[scan eggs->error]]
[[scan sponge->error]]
passages.name: Self-Checkout

passages.text:
Malfunction! Error! 101010101011101! 
CALLING ATTENDANT TO ASSIST!

[[NO!->Cashier]]
[[NO!->Cashier]]
[[NO!->Cashier]]
[[NO!->Cashier]]
passages.name: error

passages.text:
Looks like you've got a debit card. You have to push the button for debit and then enter your pin.

[[Oh okay->Debit]]
[[But... I thought...]]
[[Of course->smug_debit]]
passages.name: What happened?

passages.text:
END
AAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAA
passages.name: PANIC!

passages.text:
END
Oh no
I look stupid
I want to hide
I can't do this
I annoyed her
passages.name: But... I thought...

passages.text:
END
She doesn't believe me
Why is it wrong?
I'm sweating
It's hard to type
I can't remember it.
They're all laughing
Too nervous...
passages.name: forgot

passages.text:
END
Of course?!
I look like an idiot
What am I saying?
I'm obviously lying
She thinks I'm shit
I am shit
passages.name: smug_debit

passages.text:
(She takes the bill from you and looks at you strangely)

[[Sorry! It is all I have->sorry]]
[[*Wait for her to make change*]]
[[Oh god you hate me now, I'm so sorry->sorry]]

links.name: Sorry! It is all I have
Oh god you hate me now, I'm so sorry

passages.name: Pay with the hundred2

passages.text:
END
I can't do it
I'm such a bad liar
I'm shaking
She already knows
She sees right through me
Why did I try to lie?
This is REALLY bad!
passages.name: Lie

passages.text:
END
Why does she look surprised?
She must think I'm spoiled!
So embarassing!
A normal person would know.
passages.name: I don't know

passages.text:
Okay. We'll call it three. Your total will be $8.95. Cash or credit?

[[Cash]]
[[Credit]]
[[I'm broke]]
[[Uh, uhh... uh.......->PANIC!]]
passages.name: About three dollars

passages.text:
No, I'll just look it up. There. Your total will be $8.95. Cash or credit?

[[Cash]]
[[Credit]]
[[I'm broke]]
[[Uh, uhh... uh.......->PANIC!]]
passages.name: I can go check

passages.text:
END
Of course
Why did I say that?
I look so stupid
Why did I come here?
What was I thinking?
I don't need anything here
